description.value:
School conjuration (summoning); Level cleric/oracle 5, sorcerer/wizard 5, summoner 4, unchained Summoner 4, witch 5;

Casting Time 1 round
Components V, S, F/DF (an oil lamp worth at least 50 gp)

Range close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)
Effect one summoned genie
Duration 1 round/level (D)
Saving Throw none; Spell Resistance no

Description

This spell functions like lesser summon genie, except you can summon one djinni or 1d3 jann.

materials.focus: an oil lamp worth at least 50 gp

data.shortDescription: This spell functions like lesser summon genie, except you can summon one djinni or 1d3 jann.
